SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Ranch relative to Riverbend Plantation?
SRP.A: Ironwood Ranch is {below} Riverbend Plantation in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Golden Harvest Cooperative}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Whispering Willows Estate}.

VE.Q: What are the crop yield of Ironwood Ranch, Golden Harvest Cooperative, and Riverbend Plantation in 2004?
VE.A: Ironwood Ranch's crop yield is {378455.12} tons/hectare, Golden Harvest Cooperative's crop yield is {378333.86} tons/hectare, Riverbend Plantation's crop yield is {218336.98} tons/hectare.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Crop Yield exceed 1540135.56 tons/hectare? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2017, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 2006 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 2003 and 2017 was {higher} than between 2006 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2008, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 1990 and 2011?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 1998 and 2008 was {higher} than between 1990 and 2011.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 1994 higher or lower than in 2010?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 1994 was {lower} than in 2010.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 2001 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 2001 was {lower} than in 2004.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Golden Harvest Cooperative} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Whispering Willows Estate, Sunstone Farms, Riverbend Plantation, Ironwood Ranch, Golden Harvest Cooperative}.
